title: Ranked Spectate
body:
Hey guys, was just wondering if anyone knew if/when high elo ranked games were going to be brought back into the spectator list on the main client page of league instead of just norms and aram? I used to watch them all the time to learn from people much better than myself, and have been wondering for a while now when they would come back. Cheers guys
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: Just go into Leagues, pick to view the challengers and pick one to spectate.

As far as I'm aware this is an issue caused by NCS (New champ select) and is affecting all regions.

My guess as to when it will be resolved will be around the time [all the other bugs relating to NCS](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/HpUTbovb-known-issues-with-new-champ-select) are fixed.
